rows.label: fev03_030_125_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, Tora...
Is the place where Umon-san is
not affected by the Cloud Sea's tides?

rows.label: fev03_030_125_msg0003
rows.name:
Since we went to help Nia...
Even now, the Cloud Sea's position
is at a pretty low level, right?

rows.label: fev03_030_125_msg0004
rows.name:
I was wondering if we'd need to
plan different routes based on
the conditions.

rows.label: fev03_030_125_msg0005
rows.name:
You're right. The Cloud Sea's tides
definitely affect which areas you all
can access.

rows.label: fev03_030_125_msg0006
rows.name:
Sometimes you can swim through the Cloud
Sea to reach places that were
previously inaccessible...

rows.label: fev03_030_125_msg0007
rows.name:
On the other hand, some areas might
become unavailable when they
sink beneath the Cloud Sea.

rows.label: fev03_030_125_msg0008
rows.name:
That's exactly it.
That's why I was wondering
what kind of location we're headed to.

rows.label: fev03_030_125_msg0010
rows.name:
But don't worry!
The route to Uncle Umon's shipyard
isn't affected by the Cloud Sea at all!

rows.label: fev03_030_125_msg0012
rows.name:
If we could only reach it during high
tide, we'd have to rest somewhere
until the Cloud Sea rose.

rows.label: fev03_030_125_msg0014
rows.name:
I wouldn't mind taking a proper rest at
an inn and patiently waiting
for the Cloud Sea level to change.

rows.label: fev03_030_125_msg0015
rows.name:
Because being inside Rex's helmet
is tiring...

rows.label: fev03_030_125_msg0016
rows.name:
Alright, alright, we can do that the
next time we visit the inn in Torigo.

rows.label: fev03_030_125_msg0017
rows.name:
For now, our destination is
Uncle Umon's shipyard!
